Hillary Clinton Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.), who recently took over Hillary Clinton 's former seat on the Senate Armed Services Committee, also worried today about decreased funding of the Marines: The Marine Corps must have the resources it needs to respond to new and emerging cyber threats and terror threats in different parts of the world. Secretary Robert Gates will explain his vision to the committee next week, and I look forward to working with him to ensure the Marine Corps is well-positioned to respond to the new security demands that will continue to emerge, Kirsten Gillibrand said in a statement. ''We have been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time,'' said Eric Schmidt in announcing the decision.
